metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to the elderly man who is walking in the LOW Park while he is separated from his partner

0.speaker: Bertram Kostaka
0.text: Too busy to chat, I'm afraid. This walk must be completed.

1.speaker: Bertram Kostaka
1.text: If you spent as much time walking as you did talking, my friend, you'd have a body like mine in a decade or two!
